医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Omicron 变种 BA.2.86 传播速度更快，但目前的抗病毒药物坚守阵地研究人员发现 BA.2.86 Omicron 谱系比目前的优势菌株具有更高的传播潜力，但表明现有的抗病毒药物仍然有效。尽管其传染性较高，BA.2.86 在仓鼠中表现出较低的致病性，表明复制能力下降可能导致感染程度减轻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Omicron-variant-BA286-spreads-faster-but-current-antivirals-hold-the-line.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Omicron-variant-BA286-spreads-faster-but-current-antivirals-hold-the-line.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd1efb54-7719-4eac-84e0-c057f66e8adc Tue, 07 Nov 2023 00:26:00 -0500 Omicron variant BA.2.86 spreads faster, but current antivirals hold the line
Stellaromics 获得 2500 万美元系列资金，以推进 3D 空间多组学分析Stellaromics 今天宣布该公司在 A 轮融资中筹集了 2500 万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Stellaromics-secures-2425-million-in-series-a-funding-to-advance-3D-spatial-multi-omic-profiling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Stellaromics-secures-2425-million-in-series-a-funding-to-advance-3D-spatial-multi-omic-profiling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=200b2a18-13b1-4f0c-9892-60b6a5b0f5a9 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 00:06:00 -0500 Stellaromics secures $25 million in series a funding to advance 3D spatial multi-omic profiling
蛋白质组学研究确定了长期新冠诊断和持续健康影响的潜在生物标志物一项为期两年的纵向研究强调了长期新冠患者的蛋白质组变化，揭示了用于诊断的潜在生物标志物，并揭示了幸存者面临的持续生理挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Proteomic-study-pinpoints-潜在-生物标记-for-long-COVID-diagnosis-and-persistent-health-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Proteomic-study-pinpoints-潜在-生物标记-for-long-COVID-diagnosis-and-persistent-health-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07f0fd34-95ed-4c62-87b5-985aa1f80827 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 00:05:00 -0500 Proteomic study pinpoints potential biomarkers for long-COVID diagnosis and persistent health impacts
Enhanc3D Genomics 任命 Hazel Jones 为首席运营官，扩大领导团队Enhanc3D Genomics 今天宣布任命 Hazel Jones 为首席运营官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Enhanc3D-Genomics-expands-leadership-team-with-the-appointment-of-Hazel-Jones-as-Chief-Operating-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Enhanc3D-Genomics-expands-leadership-team-with-the-appointment-of-Hazel-Jones-as-Chief-Operating-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f6cd4a6-2f60-4f49-bcee-e2932cd20667 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 23:59:00 -0500 Enhanc3D Genomics expands leadership team with the appointment of Hazel Jones as Chief Operating Officer
新型假肢将大脑信号实时转换为语音由杜克大学神经科学家、神经外科医生和工程师组成的协作团队开发的言语假肢可以将人的大脑信号转化为他们想要说的话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-prosthetic-converts-brain-signals-to-speech-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-prosthetic-converts-brain-signals-to-speech-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff738836-e0de-40b7-bbfb-5714cc9d1114 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 23:48:00 -0500 New prosthetic converts brain signals to speech in real time
益生菌与二甲双胍搭配可能会改变 2 型糖尿病控制的游戏规则益生菌补充剂显示出通过改善血糖控制来控制 2 型糖尿病的前景，特别是与二甲双胍联合使用时，尽管结果因益生菌成分和治疗方案而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Probiotics-paired-with-metformin-could-be-a-game-changer-in-type-2-diabetes-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Probiotics-paired-with-metformin-could-be-a-game-changer-in-type-2-diabetes-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=895db27e-d111-4ac8-8224-fa20e79d7d7a Mon, 06 Nov 2023 23:47:00 -0500 Probiotics paired with metformin could be a game-changer in type 2 diabetes control
虚拟脑库为癫痫、脑肿瘤研究创造了强大的资源由伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校领导的横跨芝加哥五个学术医疗中心的新虚拟脑库将为癫痫、脑肿瘤和神经系统疾病的临床护理和研究创造强大的新资源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-virtual-brain-bank-creates-a-powerful-resource-for-research-on-epilepsy-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-virtual-brain-bank-creates-a-powerful-resource-for-research-on-epilepsy-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5476bc88-f801-4dd6-8240-e9d3f6526963 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 23:41:00 -0500 Virtual brain bank creates a powerful resource for research on epilepsy, brain tumors
即食农产品的新鲜风险：研究揭示了常见病原体如何潜伏在我们的沙拉中这篇研究论文深入探讨了即食水果和蔬菜被大肠杆菌、沙门氏菌和李斯特菌等肠道病原体污染的风险，这些病原体可能导致食源性疾病。它还探讨了污染源和植物与病原体的相互作用，强调了改进食品供应链安全措施的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Fresh-risks-in-ready-to-eat- Produce-Study-reveals-how-common-pathogens-lurk-in-our-salads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Fresh-risks-in-ready-to-eat- Produce-Study-reveals-how-common-pathogens-lurk-in-our-salads.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3274f362-8a17-4b80-a1a8-297c5c814e40 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 23:33:00 -0500 Fresh risks in ready-to-eat produce: Study reveals how common pathogens lurk in our salads
新型量表有效测量儿童和成人与流行病相关的压力流行病相关创伤压力量表 (PTSS) 可用于有效测量与 COVID-19 大流行相关的压力，并识别压力水平较高、可能需要额外心理健康支持的儿童和成人。美国国立卫生研究院的环境对儿童健康成果计划 (ECHO) 的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-scale- effectively-measures-pandemic-lated-stress-in-children-and-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-scale- effectively-measures-pandemic-lated-stress-in-children-and-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d6420f5-cf6a-42cc-8923-cee49ea41442 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:39:00 -0500 Novel scale effectively measures pandemic-related stress in children and adults
血液检测可提前两年预测多发性硬化症残疾恶化根据加州大学旧金山分校研究人员牵头的一项新研究，多发性硬化症患者的血液检查显示 NfL（一种神经损伤的生物标志物）升高，一到两年后可能会出现残疾恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Blood-test-predicts-MS-disability-worsening-up-to-two-years-in-advance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Blood-test-predicts-MS-disability-worsening-up-to-two-years-in-advance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87021bd8-aed7-4918-9166-a123cb387387 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:29:07 -0500 Blood test predicts MS disability worsening up to two years in advance
